translations.description_da: Smart udvidelse til skift af arbejdsområde

translations.description_nl: Stijlvolle extensie om van werkruimte te wisselen

SanitizeXsessionErrors@claudiux.name: Sanitize ~/.xsession-errors
SanitizeXsessionErrors@claudiux.description: Filter messages sent to ~/.xsession-errors, to avoid flooding and save your SSD.

translations.description_da: Filtrer meddelelser sendt til ~/.xsession-errors for at undgå at fylde den op og spar på pladsen på din disk.
translations.description_de: Meldungen an ~/.xsession-errors filtern, um Überflutung der Logdatei zu vermeiden und die SSD zu schonen.
translations.description_es: Filtra los mensajes enviados a ~/.xsession-errors, para evitar flooding y salvaguardar su SSD.
translations.description_eu: Iragazi '~/.xsession-errors'-era bidaltzen diren mezuak, uholdeak saihesteko eta zure SSDa salbatzeko.
translations.description_fr: Filtre les messages envoyés au fichier ~/.xsession-errors, afin d'éviter qu'il soit noyé de messages inutiles et afin d'épargner votre disque SSD.
translations.description_hu: Az ~/.xsession-errors számára küldött üzenetek szűrése, hogy elkerülje a felesleges adatáradatot és védje SSD-jét.
translations.description_it: Filtra i messaggi inviati a ~/.xsession-errors, per evitare il flooding e salvare il tuo SSD.
translations.description_nl: Filter berichten verzonden naar ~/.xsession-errors, om te voorkomen dat je SSD volloopt en om deze te sparen.
translations.description_pt_BR: Filtre as mensagens a serem consideradas erros da sessão (~/.xsession-errors), de modo a evitar encher o armazenamento do seu disco.
translations.description_ro: Filtrează mesajele trimise la ~/.xsession-errors, pentru a evita inundarea acestuia și pentru a scuti SSD-ul.
translations.description_ru: Фильтрация сообщений в ~/.xsession-errors для исключения однотипных сообщений (спама) и продления жизни вашего SSD накопителя.
translations.description_zh: 过滤的消息发送到~/.xsession-errors，以避免数据泛滥并拯救您的SSD。

translations.description_da: Tilpassede skyggeparametre
translations.description_es: Parámetros de sombra personalizables
translations.description_eu: Itzalen parametro pertsonalizagarriak
translations.description_hu: Testreszabható árnyék paraméterei
translations.description_it: Parametri personalizzabile per le ombreggiature
translations.description_nl: Aanpasbare schaduwparameters
translations.description_pt_BR: Ajuste a sombra das janelas
translations.description_ro: Parametri personalizabili pentru umbre
translations.description_ru: Настраиваемые параметры теней
translations.description_zh: 自定义阴影参数

adjacent-windows@klangman.name: Adjacent Windows
adjacent-windows@klangman.description: Use hotkeys to switch to adjacent windows

translations.description_es: Utilice teclas de acceso rápido para cambiar a ventanas adyacentes

translations.description_nl: Gebruik sneltoetsen om naar aangrenzende vensters over te schakelen

back-to-monitor@nathan818fr.name: Back to Monitor
back-to-monitor@nathan818fr.description: Move windows back to their original location when (re-)connecting a monitor.

translations.description_da: Flyt vinduer tilbage til deres oprindelige placering, når en skærm tilkobles (igen).
translations.description_es: Mueve las ventanas a su ubicación original al (re)conectar un monitor.
translations.description_eu: Eraman leihoak jatorrizko lekura monitorea konektatzen denean.
translations.description_fr: Déplacer les fenêtres à leur emplacement d'origine lors de la (re)connexion d'un moniteur.
translations.description_hu: Visszahelyezi az ablakokat az eredeti helyére, amikor újracsatlakoztat egy kijelzőt.
translations.description_it: Riporta le finestre nella loro posizione originale quando (ri)connetti un monitor.
translations.description_nl: Verplaats vensters terug naar hun oorspronkelijke locatie bij het (opnieuw) aansluiten van een monitor.
translations.description_pt_BR: Mova as janelas para suas posições originais ao (re)conectar um monitor.
translations.description_ro: Mută ferestrele înapoi la locația lor inițială atunci când se (re)conectează un monitor.
translations.description_zh: 当显示器重新连接时，移动窗口到显示器上他们原来的位置。

translations.description_da: Sløret baggrund i oversigten (Ctrl+Alt+Pil ned)
translations.name_es: Desenfocar la vista general de las ventanas abiertas
translations.description_es: Desenfocar el fondo mostrando todas las ventanas abiertas en el escritorio actual ([Ctrl]+[Alt]+[Flecha abajo])
translations.description_eu: Horma-papera lausotu ikuspegi orokorrean ([Ctrl]+[Alt]+[Behera])
translations.description_hu: Háttér elmosása áttekintésnél ([Ctrl]+[Alt]+[Down Arrow])
translations.description_it: Sfocatura dello sfondo in panoramica ([Ctrl]+[Alt]+[Freccia Giù])
translations.description_nl: Vervaag de achtergrond in het overzicht ([Ctrl]+[Alt]+[Pijl-omlaag])
translations.name_pt_BR: Desfocar a visão geral de janelas abertas
translations.description_pt_BR: Desfoque o plano de fundo ao exibir todas as janelas abertas na área de trabalho atual ([Ctrl]+[Alt]+[Seta para baixo])
translations.description_ro: Estomparea fundalului în vedere generală ([Ctrl]+[Alt]+[Săgeată jos])
translations.description_ru: Размытие фона в режиме обзора ([Ctrl]+[Alt]+[Down])
translations.description_zh: 显示概览界面时让背景模糊([Ctrl]+[Alt]+[方向下键])
translations.description_zh_CN: 显示概览界面时让背景模糊([Ctrl]+[Alt]+[方向下键])

translations.description_de: Cinnamon Erweiterung für dynamische Desktop Hintergründe basierend auf Zeit und Ort

translations.description_da: Fjern vinduers titellinje efter behag.
translations.description_de: Titelleiste von Fenstern nach Belieben entfernen

translations.description_da: Skift mellem arbejdsområder ved at rulle på skærmens venstre og højre kanter.
translations.description_de: Wechseln der Arbeitsfläche durch Scrollen am linken und rechten Bildschirmrand.

translations.description_ru: Переключайтесь между рабочими столами используя прокрутку колесом мыши у левого и правого края экрана.

mouse-shake-zoom@rcalixte.name: Mouse Shake Zoom Extension
mouse-shake-zoom@rcalixte.description: Quickly shake the mouse pointer back and forth to zoom the cursor

translations.description_da: Flyt musemarkøren hurtigt fra side til side for at forstørre markøren
translations.name_es: Extensión de zoom con movimiento del mouse
translations.description_es: Agite rápidamente el puntero del ratón hacia delante y hacia atrás para ampliar el cursor
translations.description_eu: Azkar astindu saguaren erakuslea alde batetik bestera kurtsorea handitzeko
translations.description_hu: Gyorsan rázza meg a egérmutatót balról jobbra a nagyításhoz
translations.description_it: Agita rapidamente il puntatore del mouse avanti e indietro per eseguire lo zoom
translations.description_nl: Schud de muisaanwijzer snel heen en weer om de cursor te vergroten
translations.name_pt: Extensão de Ampliação do Tamanho do Mouse por Agitação
translations.description_pt: Agite rapidamente o ponteiro do mouse de um lado para o outro para aumentar temporariamente o tamanho do cursor
translations.name_ru: Увеличить Курсор Мыши Жестами (Mouse Shake Zoom Extension)
translations.description_ru: Быстро передвигайте (трясите) курсор мыши вперёд и назад для его увеличения
translations.name_zh: 晃动鼠标指针放大扩展
translations.description_zh: 快速来回摇晃鼠标指针以放大光标

opacify@anish.org.name: Opacify Windows
opacify@anish.org.description: Fade out the current window that the user is resizing or dragging.

translations.description_da: Gør vinduet, som flyttes eller hvis størrelse ændres, delvist gennemsigtigt.
translations.description_de: Aktuelles Fenster beim Verschieben oder bei Größenänderung durchsichtig machen.
translations.description_es: Desvanece la ventana actual que el usuario está redimensionando o arrastrando.
translations.description_eu: Erabiltzailea berpizten edo arrastatzen ari den egungo leihoa opakotu
translations.description_hu: Az aktuális ablak elmosódása, amelyet a felhasználó átméretez vagy áthelyez.
translations.description_it: Dissolve la finestra attuale che l'utente sta ridimensionando o trascinando.
translations.description_nl: Vervaag het huidige venster waarvan de gebruiker het formaat is aan het aanpassen of dat hij aan het slepen is.
translations.description_pt_BR: Enxergue a janela atual com transparência ao movê-la ou redimensioná-la.
translations.description_ro: Se opacifiază fereastra curentă pe care utilizatorul o redimensionează sau o trage.
translations.description_ru: Сделать окно прозрачным если его перемещают или меняют размер.
translations.description_tr: Kullanıcının boyutlandırdığı ya da sürüklediği pencerenin matlığını değiştirir.
translations.description_zh: 当用户重新调整窗口大小或拖动窗口时淡出窗口。
translations.description_zh_CN: 当用户重新调整窗口大小或拖动窗口时淡出窗口。

rnbdsh@negateWindow.name: Negate Window on Super+I
rnbdsh@negateWindow.description: A Cinnamon extension that allows to negate the window-color when you press super+i.

translations.description_da: Invertér farverne i et vindue, når du trykker super+i.
translations.description_de: Eine Cinnamon-Erweiterung, die beim Drücken von »Super+I« die Fensterfarben umkehrt.
translations.name_es: Invertir colores de ventana con Super+I
translations.description_es: Una extensión de Cinnamon que le permite invertir el color de la ventana cuando presiona Super+I.
translations.description_eu: Cinnamonen luzapen bat leihoaren kolorea inbertitzeko super+i sakatzean.
translations.description_hu: Cinnamon kiterjesztés, amely lehetővé teszi az ablak színének invertálását, amikor a super+i billentyűket lenyomja.
translations.description_it: Un'estensione Cinnamon che consente di annullare il colore della finestra quando si preme super+i.
translations.description_nl: Een Cinnamon-extensie waarmee je de vensterkleur kunt omkeren wanneer je op Super+i drukt.
translations.name_pt_BR: Inverter as cores da janela com Super+I
translations.description_pt_BR: Inverta a cor da janela ao pressionar as teclas Super/Windows/Command+I.
translations.description_ro: O extensie Cinnamon care permite negarea culorii ferestrei atunci când apeși super+i.
translations.name_ru: Негативное Окно Используя Super+I (Negate Window on Super+I)
translations.description_ru: Расширение Cinnamon позволяющее отображать окна в негативном цвете если нажать super+i.
translations.description_tr: Super+i tuşlarına bastığınızda pencereye negatif etki veren Cinnamon uzantısı.
translations.description_zh: 一个在按Super+I时反转窗口颜色的Cinnamon扩展。

slider@mohammad-sn.description: Yet another nice transition effect for ws switching.

translations.description_da: Endnu en fin overgangseffekt til skift af arbejdsområde.
translations.description_de: Ein schöner Übergangseffekt beim Wechsel der Arbeitsflächen.

smart-panel@mohammad-sn.name: Smart Panel
smart-panel@mohammad-sn.description: Switch between workspaces, show desktop, activate overview or expo, ... by scrolling, double click, mouse gestures etc on free space of the panel.

translations.description_da: Skift mellem arbejdsområder, vis skrivebord, vis oversigt over vinduer eller arbejdsområder, ... med rulning, dobbeltkilk, musebevægelser osv. på frie områder i panelet.
translations.description_es: Cambie entre espacios de trabajo, mostrar escritorio, activar vista general o expo, ... mediante desplazamiento, doble clic, gestos del ratón, etc. en el espacio libre del panel.
translations.description_eu: Lan-espazioen artean aldatu, mahaigaina erakutsi, ikuspegi orokorra edo expoa aktibatu... korritzerakoan, klik bikoitzan, saguaren keinuekin eta abar, panelaren espazio librean.
translations.description_fr: Passer d'un espace de travail à l'autre, afficher le bureau, activer la vue d'ensemble ou l'expo, ... par défilement, double clic, gestes de la souris, etc. sur l'espace libre du panneau.
translations.description_hu: Váltás a panel üres helyén egérgörgetéssel, dupla kattintással, egérgesztusokkal a munkaterületek között, megjeleníti az Asztalt, az Áttekintő vagy a Közszemle nézetet.
translations.description_it: Passa da un'area di lavoro all'altra, mostra desktop, attiva panoramica o esposizione, ... scorrendo, facendo doppio clic, gesti del mouse ecc. sullo spazio libero del pannello.
translations.description_ko: 작업 공간 전환, 바탕 화면 표시, 패널에서 스크롤, 더블 클릭 등의 마우스 제스처 사용 등의 다양한 기능을 지원합니다.
translations.description_nl: Schakel tussen werkruimten, toon bureaublad, activeer overzicht of expo, ... door te scrollen, dubbelklikken, muisbewegingen enz. op vrije ruimte van het paneel.
translations.description_pt_BR: Role com o mouse, clique duas vezes ou use gestos do mouse no espaço livre do painel, de modo a: alternar entre os espaços de trabalho; mostrar a área de trabalho; mostrar as janelas abertas; mostrar todos os espaços de trabalho; ...
translations.description_ro: Comută între spațiile de lucru, afișează biroul, activează prezentarea generală sau expo, ... prin derulare, dublu clic, gesturi ale mouse-ului etc. pe spațiul liber al panoului.
translations.description_ru: Переключайтесь между рабочими столами, активируйте обзор окон или режим экспо. Используя колесо мыши, двойной щелчок, жесты мыши и т. д. Используя свободное пространство на панели.
translations.description_sv: Växla mellan arbetsytor, visa skrivbordet, aktivera översikt eller expo, ... genom skrollning, dubbelklick, musgester etc. på ledigt utrymme i panelen.
translations.description_tr: Panelin boş alanında kaydırma, çift tıklama, fare hareketleri vb. ile çalışma alanları arasında geçiş yapar, masaüstünü gösterir, ölçekleme veya sergi ekranını etkinleştirir.
translations.description_uk: Перемикайтеся між робочими областями, показуйте робочий стіл, активуйте огляд або експозицію за допомогою прокручування, подвійного клацання, жестів миші тощо на вільному просторі панелі.
translations.description_zh: 通过滚动、双击、鼠标手势等等在面板上在工作区、显示桌面、激活概览或显示之间切换，...
translations.description_zh_CN: 通过滚动、双击、鼠标手势等等在面板上在工作区、显示桌面、激活概览或显示之间切换，...

transparent-panels-reloaded@marcelovbcfi.name: Transparent panels reloaded
transparent-panels-reloaded@marcelovbcfi.description: Make your panels transparent (or not) and change their color as you wish

translations.description_da: Gør dine paneler gennemsigtige, når der ikke er nogen maksimerede vinduer
translations.description_de: Macht Leisten durchsichtig, wenn Fenster nicht maximiert sind
translations.description_es: Haz tus paneles transparentes cuando no hay ninguna ventana maximizada
translations.description_eu: Zure panelak gardenak izan daitezela (edo ez) eta kolorea alda dezatela nahi duzun bezala.
translations.description_fi: Paneelien läpinäkyvyys, kun ikkunoita ei ole maksimoitu
translations.description_fr: Rendre transparents vos tableaux de bords lorsqu'il n'y a pas de fenêtres agrandies.
translations.description_hr: Paneli su prozirni kada nema uvećanih prozora.
translations.description_hu: Átlátszóvá teheti a paneleket, ha nincsenek maximalizált ablakok
translations.description_it: Rendi trasparenti i tuoi pannelli quando non ci sono finestre ingrandite
translations.description_nl: Maak uw panelen transparant (of niet) en verander hun kleur zoals u wilt
translations.description_pt_BR: Aplique transparência em seus painéis quando não houver janelas maximizadas
translations.description_ro: Transparentizează panourile tale când nu sunt ferestre maximizate
translations.description_ru: Сделайте ваши панели прозрачными (или нет) и измените их цвет по своему желанию
translations.description_sv: Gör dina paneler transparenta när det inte finns några maximerade fönster
translations.description_tr: Pencereler ekranı kaplamadığında panellerinizi şeffaf hale getirir
translations.description_zh: 使您的面板透明（或不透明）并根据需要更改其颜色
translations.description_zh_CN: 使您的面板透明（或不透明）并根据需要更改其颜色

transparent-panels@germanfr.name: Transparent panels
transparent-panels@germanfr.description: Transparentize your panels when there are no any maximized windows

translations.description_da: Gør dine paneler gennemsigtige, når der ikke er nogen maksimerede vinduer
translations.description_de: Macht Leisten durchsichtig, wenn Fenster nicht maximiert sind
translations.description_es: Haz tus paneles transparentes cuando no hay ninguna ventana maximizada
translations.description_eu: Panelak gardendu leiho maximizatuak ez daudenean
translations.description_fi: Paneelien läpinäkyvyys, kun ikkunoita ei ole maksimoitu
translations.description_fr: Rendre transparents vos tableaux de bords lorsqu'il n'y a pas de fenêtres agrandies.
translations.description_hr: Paneli su prozirni kada nema uvećanih prozora.
translations.description_hu: Átlátszóvá teheti a paneleket, ha nincsenek maximalizált ablakok
translations.description_it: Rendi trasparenti i tuoi pannelli quando non ci sono finestre ingrandite
translations.description_ja: 最大化されたウィンドウが無いときに、パネルを透明化
translations.description_nl: Maak je panelen transparant wanneer er geen gemaximaliseerde vensters zijn
translations.description_pt_BR: Aplique transparência em seus painéis quando não houver janelas maximizadas
translations.description_ro: Transparentizează panourile tale când nu sunt ferestre maximizate
translations.description_sv: Gör dina paneler transparenta när det inte finns några maximerade fönster
translations.description_tr: Pencereler ekranı kaplamadığında panellerinizi şeffaf hale getirir
translations.description_uk: Зробіть панелі прозорими, якщо вони не є розгорнутими вікнами
translations.description_zh: 在没有任何最大化的窗口时让您的面板透明
translations.description_zh_CN: 在没有任何最大化的窗口时让您的面板透明

user-shadows@nathan818fr.name: User Shadows
user-shadows@nathan818fr.description: Customize the shadows of cinnamon windows

translations.description_da: Tilpas Cinnamonvinduers skygge
translations.description_es: Personaliza las sombras de las ventanas de Cinnamon
translations.description_eu: Cinnamonen leihoen itzalak pertsonalizatu.
translations.description_fr: Personnaliser les ombres des fenêtres de cinnamon
translations.description_hu: Cinnamon ablakok árnyékának testreszabása
translations.description_it: Personalizza le ombre delle finestre di Cinnamon
translations.description_nl: Pas de schaduwen van Cinnamon-vensters aan
translations.description_pt: Personalize as sombras nas janelas do Cinnamon
translations.description_pt_BR: Ajuste as sombras das janelas no Cinnamon
translations.description_ro: Personalizează umbrele ferestrelor Cinnamon
translations.description_ru: Настройте тени окон в Cinnamon
translations.description_zh: 自定义Cinnamon窗口的阴影

watermark@germanfr.name: Watermark
watermark@germanfr.description: Place a watermark on the desktop.

translations.description_da: Placér et vandmærke på skrivebordet.
translations.description_de: Platziert ein Wasserzeichen auf dem Desktop.
translations.description_es: Coloca una marca de agua en el escritorio.
translations.description_eu: Jarri ur-marka bat idazmahaian.
translations.description_fr: Place une image ou une icône en filigrane sur le bureau.
translations.description_hu: Vízjel helyezése az asztalra.
translations.description_it: Imposta un watermark sul desktop.
translations.description_nl: Plaatst een watermerk op het bureaublad.
translations.description_pt_BR: Coloque uma marca-d'água na área de trabalho.
translations.description_ro: Așează un filigran pe desktop.
translations.description_zh: 在桌面上放置一个水印。

translations.description_da: Compiz lever igen!
translations.description_es: ¡Compiz vivirá de nuevo!
translations.description_eu: Compiz berriz biziko da!
translations.description_hu: Compiz újra élni fog!
translations.description_it: Compiz tornerà a vivere!
translations.description_nl: Compiz zal herleven!
translations.description_pt_BR: Faça uso de uma animação do Compiz ao arrastar janelas!
translations.description_ro: Compiz va trăi din nou!
translations.description_ru: Compiz будет жить снова!
translations.description_zh: Compiz应该复活！

workspace-scroller@ori.name: Workspace Scroller
workspace-scroller@ori.description: Switch workspaces using mouse scroll at screen edges.

translations.description_da: Skift arbejdsområde ved at rulle med musen på skærmkanterne.
translations.description_de: Arbeitsflächen wechseln durch Scrollen mit dem Mausrad an den Bildschirmrändern.
translations.description_es: Cambia de espacio de trabajo utilizando el desplazamiento del ratón por los bordes de la pantalla.
translations.description_hu: Munkaterület váltása a képernyő éleinél történő egérgörgő használattal.
translations.description_it: Cambia area di lavoro usando lo scorrimento del mouse ai bordi dello schermo.
translations.description_nl: Wissel tussen werkruimtes door te scrollen aan de randen van het scherm met de muis.
translations.name_pt_BR: Rolar para alternar espaços de trabalho
translations.description_pt_BR: Alterne os espaços de trabalho usando a rolagem do mouse nas bordas da tela.
translations.description_ro: Comută spațiile de lucru utilizând derularea mouse-ului la marginile ecranului.
translations.description_ru: Используйте края экрана для переключения рабочих столов колесом мыши.
translations.description_sv: Växla arbetsytor med hjälp av mushjulet, vid skärmkanterna.
translations.description_tr: Fare kaydırma tuşunu kullanarak ekran kenarlarından çalışma alanlarını değiştirin.
translations.description_zh: 在屏幕边缘使用鼠标滚轮切换工作区。
translations.description_zh_CN: 在屏幕边缘使用鼠标滚轮切换工作区。
